titles.title: To provide a grant under the urban park and recreation recovery program to assist in the development of a Millennium Cultural Cooperative Park in Youngstown, Ohio.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 5/3/2001--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to make a grant from funds made available to carry out the Urban Park and Recreation Recovery Act of 1978 to the Youngstown Playhouse of Youngstown, Ohio, for the development of a Millennium Cultural Cooperative Park.
